name: Minecraft BO3 Object
summary: Learn about .BO3 files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Minecraft objects consist of blocks that can spawn in your biomes. They can be ores, trees, dungeons, and other structures.

You must place the BO3 file in one of your two custom biome object (BOB) folders. The global folder allows all your TerrainControl worlds to use the BO3 file. The local folder allows only one world to use the BO3 file.
NOTE: BO3 stands for Biome Object Builder version 3. The BO3 format replaced the .BO2 format.

description: A BO3 file is a Minecraft object file used by TerrainControl, a Minecraft modding application used to generate worlds. It contains Minecraft terrain objects. BO3 files also store settings that control when sunlight, darkness, water, and lava spawn in the world.
